title: European beliefs and competition over colonies

content.prompt: In the late 1800s, attitudes such as the one expressed in the passage had contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: European statesâ€™ competition to acquire overseas colonies
The creation of industrialized economies in Europe
Efforts by European missionaries to convert non-Europeans to Christianity for their spiritual salvation

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
